hibernate-mapping.query: select new trantypedto (tt.Status ) from TLMORM00005 as tt where tt.TransactionCode=:transactionCode and tt.Active = true

select new trantypedto( t.TransactionCode, t.Description, t.Narration, t.Status, t.PBReference, t.RVReference, t.UniqueId ) from TLMORM00005 as t
where t.TransactionCode =: tranCode and t.Active = true

select new trantypedto( t.TransactionCode, t.Description, t.Narration, t.Status, t.PBReference, t.RVReference, t.UniqueId, t.Active, t.TS, t.CreatedDate, t.CreatedUserId, t.UpdatedDate, t.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00005 as t where ( t.TransactionCode =: TranTypeCode or t.Description =: description )

select new trantypedto( t.TransactionCode, t.Description, t.Narration, t.Status, t.PBReference, t.RVReference, t.UniqueId, t.Active, t.TS, t.CreatedDate, t.CreatedUserId, t.UpdatedDate, t.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00005 as t where t.Active = true

select new trantypedto( t.TransactionCode, t.Description, t.Narration, t.Status, t.PBReference, t.RVReference, t.UniqueId, t.Active, t.TS, t.CreatedDate, t.CreatedUserId, t.UpdatedDate, t.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00005 as t where t.TransactionCode = :tranCode and t.Active = true
